channel.description: Recent content in Pages on Codewrecks

item.title: About
item.description: My name is Gian Maria and I was born with a huge interest for computers and everything related, basically I’m a geek. I started playing with my first computer, a commodore Vic20 and I discovered that I really like programming. I had only 3.5 KB of memory for my programs and It seemed to me that computers will really change my life*. I begin programming in Vic20 BASIC, then BASIC80, then I studied Pascal, Fortran (a little bit), a little bit of prolog and Cobol.

item.title: Privacy
item.description: List of Cookies used in this site Google Analytics cookies: __utma, __utmb, __utmc, __utmv, __utmz, used to gather site statistic usage. You can read more info on Google Policies on: How Google uses data when you use our partnersâ€™ sites or apps and Safeguarding your Data. Google AdSense cookies: domain googleads.g.doubleclick.net, TCID, __gads, drt, id, tc_cj_v2. All of them are third party cookies used to track down ads preference and create targeted ads for the user.
